titles.title: He brought me to his banqueting table

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1. (Men) He brought me to his banqueting table
(Ladies) He brought me to his banqueting table
(repeat)
(all) And His banner, over me, is love
2. (Men) I am my beloved's and he is mine
(Ladies) I am my beloved's and he is mine
(repeat)
(all) And His banner, over me, is love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We can feel the love of God in this place
We believe your goodness
We receive your grace
We delight ourselves at your table oh God
You do all things well, just look at our lives
His banner over me is love
Yes his banner over me is love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
His banner over me
His banner over you
His banner over us, it is love, love, love
